start.content:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/tmp/subsonic.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh
cd /home/app/
java_mem=`expr $Memory - 20`
#PULSE_SERVER=`netstat -nr |grep -e ^0.0| awk '{print $2}'`
#export PULSE_SERVER
if ! test -h /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/ffmpeg
 then
 mkdir -p /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode
 ln -fs /usr/bin/ffmpeg  /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/
 ln -fs /usr/bin/lame /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/
fi

/home/app/subsonic.sh --home=/home/fs/subsonic/home/ \
--port=4040 \
--max-memory=java_mem \
--pidfile=/tmp/subsonic.pid \
--default-music-folder=/home/fs/subsonic/music \
--default-podcast-folder=/home/fs/subsonic/podcast \
--default-playlist-folder=/home/fs/subsonic/playlist

#java -Xmx${java_mem}m \
#  -Dsubsonic.home=/home/fs/subsonic/home/ \
#  -Dsubsonic.host=0.0.0.0 \
#  -Dsubsonic.port=4040 \
#  -Dsubsonic.httpsPort=0 \
#  -Dsubsonic.contextPath=/ \
#  -Dsubsonic.defaultMusicFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/music \
#  -Dsubsonic.defaultPodcastFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/podcast \
#  -Dsubsonic.defaultPlaylistFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/playlist \
#  -Djava.awt.headless=true \
#  -verbose:gc \
#  -jar subsonic-booter-jar-with-dependencies.jar > /var/log/subsonic.log 2>&1 &


startup_complete
while ! test -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_term -o -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_quit
do
 sleep 20 &
 wait
done
shutdown_complete

exit
